extendedInfo.description: Thanks for finding this free Detroit Free Press app. The Detroit Free Press (freep.com), Michigan's largest newsroom, brings you the latest breaking news headlines, sports and entertainment buzz from Detroit. Be the first to know with our in-depth coverage of Detroitâs auto industry. This app is a Detroit sports fanâs must-have for the latest on the Lions, Red Wings, Pistons, Tigers, University of Michigan Wolverines and Michigan State Spartans. View video from our four-time Emmy-winning staff. With this app it is easy to share and submit content too. And we pledge to continue to improve the app, so please keep checking back. Thank you.

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: My main issue is that if I\'m reading an article and the screen turns off it will not only lose my place in the article but also take me to to most recent article in that section, which is usually not the article I was reading. It would also be nice to be able to customize the app to make the sections I want to read more convenient.
reviews.author: Scott Ibbotson

reviews.title: Good app. Easy to use and looks nice
reviews.comment: I live in portland and I like using this app to keep in touch with what\'s going on in D town. Love it.
reviews.author: Stumptown DJs

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Love this app, I currently live in California but am from Michigan so it is nice to stay connected to home. I wish they would break it down by county again so I could focus on just a couple particular areas, but other than that great app.
reviews.author: Jennifer Tedlie

reviews.title: Reading this paper for 50 years
reviews.comment: Was not a fan of the scaled down print version. Sorry to see that go :( . I have been reading the e-version for a while and I love it
reviews.author: jpsemisweet

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I love this app. Easy to navigate and attractive. Highly recommend.
reviews.author: David Mingus

reviews.title: Ease of access, plenty of info
reviews.comment: I am very happy with the actual content and mechanics of the Dettoit Free Press app. It\'s only not 5 stars because sometimes the news categories are mixed up and they have frequent typos. I\'m sure it\'s due to too little staff doing too much.
reviews.author: Christina Fontana

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Detroit has been a great news town for a long time. As a native of the city I count on someone to have their finger on it\'s pulse. The Freep is that for me.
reviews.author: Mark French

reviews.comment: Love it! I catch up on my news threw out the day and before bed. Grat app.
reviews.author: Angela Kline

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Handy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Does what it should. Wish it worked out tablets.
reviews.author: Jeremiah Porter

reviews.title: Rebzrok
reviews.comment: Best auto coverage.
reviews.author: Earl Kepler

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: I have been using this app for a while now and have had no issues.  The layout is great and the navigation is easy.
reviews.author: Jeff McBurney

reviews.title: Informative
reviews.comment: Being from Detroit, I appreciate the wide coverage of all the latest city news.
reviews.author: Derek Thomas

reviews.title: Alonzo!
reviews.comment: I read it every day, it covers local, national & international topics as well as automotive business.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Font size and orientation not adjustable. It would get a 5 from me otherwise.
reviews.author: Jerry P

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I love this application.  It allows me to catch up on current events by the touch of my fingers.
reviews.author: Agrein Otis

reviews.title: Love the New App
reviews.comment: I love this app and the freep but I never click an ad or a link because when you return to the app, it refreshes back to the first article in the section no matter where you were when you left.  Does the same after a screen timeout.  Quite annoying!  I\'ll have to look for an aggregator that includes the free press.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this appt
reviews.comment: Its the bomb!!
reviews.author: christine smith

reviews.title: Great paper! Great city!
reviews.comment: Update ok but when click on photo it returns to the first page in tha t section.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good app
reviews.author: James Bryant
